title: As invasion enters fifth year, the children of Ukraine learn to fight back
summary_full: More than 385,000 Ukrainian teenagers are enrolled in a defense course, expecting war, or threats, to go on for years. In Russia, children are learning the same skills.
summary_public: More than 385,000 Ukrainian teenagers are enrolled in a defense course, expecting war, or threats, to go on for years. In Russia, children are learning the same skills.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: In Russia, children are learning the same skills.

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: the children of Ukraine learn to fight back
